Hawk Dynamics Enterprises

Project-Oriented Services

Professional • Structured • Reliable • Project-Driven

Execution, Control & Accountability

01

BOQ-Based Material Planning

  • Study project BOQ and technical specifications
  • Identify material scope & dependencies
  • Optimize quantities to avoid over-procurement
  • Align materials with project milestones
02

Project-Specific Vendor Finalization

  • Identify project-approved vendors & OEMs
  • Technical and commercial evaluation
  • Vendor compliance verification
  • Finalization based on cost, lead time & quality
03

Phase-Wise Material Procurement

  • Procurement aligned with project phases
  • Just-in-time material sourcing
  • Avoid site congestion and inventory holding
  • Controlled release of materials
04

Cost Control & Budget Alignment

  • Track procurement against project budget
  • Optimize cost without affecting specifications
  • Identify alternate approved materials if required
  • Maintain cost transparency throughout execution
05

Lead Time & Delivery Management

  • Monitor vendor manufacturing timelines
  • Track dispatch and delivery schedules
  • Coordinate logistics with site requirements
  • Ensure timely arrival to avoid project delays
06

Site Coordination & Material Readiness

  • Coordinate with project/site teams
  • Ensure materials are site-ready
  • Address site-specific requirements
  • Resolve material mismatch or shortages
07

Multi-Location Project Support

  • Centralized procurement for multiple sites
  • Location-wise material segregation
  • Coordinated dispatch planning
  • Uniform quality across all locations
08

Documentation & Compliance Handling

  • Material test certificates (MTC)
  • Warranty & guarantee documents
  • Invoice, packing list & compliance records
  • Organized handover documentation
09

Issue Resolution & Risk Mitigation

  • Handle supply chain disruptions
  • Vendor issue escalation & resolution
  • Alternate sourcing during emergencies
  • Minimize impact on project timelines
10

Project Close-Out Procurement Support

  • Final material reconciliation
  • Spare & excess material planning
  • Warranty activation coordination
  • Procurement closure reporting
11

Long-Term Project Care & AMC Support

  • Support after project handover
  • Spare parts sourcing
  • Replacement & upgrade coordination
  • Lifetime vendor & material traceability
12

Custom Project Procurement Solutions

  • Non-standard or high-risk materials
  • Import/export coordination (if applicable)
  • Specialized sourcing requirements
  • Tailored procurement strategies
